text: Gautret et al (Marseille) shows 5 out of 6  COVID-19 patients treated with hydroxychloroquine and azithomycin combination find efficacy by day 3,  6 out of 6 (100%) by day 5. while the sample size is small, this is promising.  #COVID19US #Chloroquine https://t.co/n5jgHb0uLg https://t.co/L1g56JSGt7
